metadata.title: CVE-2017-9182 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libautotrace.a in AutoTrace 0.31.1 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (use-after-free and invalid heap read), related to theGET_COLOR function in color.c:16:11.

criterions.comment: autotrace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
